# ccn

## Installation

You can install the development version of ccn from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/ccn")
```

## Code of Conduct

Please note that the ccn project is released with a [Contributor Code of
Conduct](https://contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`decode()`](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/ccn/reference/decode.md)
  : Decode a CCN
- [`emergency_hospital_code()`](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/ccn/reference/emergency_hospital_code.md)
  : Emergency Hospital Code Lookup Convert emergency codes to standard
  emergency names.
- [`get_state_name()`](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/ccn/reference/get_state_name.md)
  : State Code Lookup Convert state codes to standard state names.
- [`is_ipps_excluded_type()`](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/ccn/reference/is_ipps_excluded_type.md)
  : IPPS-Excluded Types
- [`is_medicaid_facility_type()`](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/ccn/reference/is_medicaid_facility_type.md)
  : Medicaid Facility Types
- [`supplier_code()`](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/ccn/reference/supplier_code.md)
  : Supplier Code Lookup Convert supplier codes to standard supplier
  names.
